AniList

"Hello! Anime Fans!"

ANIMATION FANS ALL OVER THE WORLD! GATHER!

This website was made in order to give animation fans recommendations on the best shows out there based on my experience, which if you click on the AniList link above, you will see I'm experienced enough to critique shows impartially

2022.05.20(FRI) ~ FOREVER

@ All Over the World, Internet Unite Us.

Main Goals

Community

Create a solid community that is interested in animation, from Japanese anime to American cartoons and animated comics

Critique Standards

We are here to critique shows, not critize them, so it's our goal to keep all the haters out and only accept criticism based on facts

Discussion

Nobody owns the truth, so to reach a general consensus on wether a show is good or bad its necessary to discuss stuff among the community, we will enable Disqus as soon as possible

Watch more!

We want our critics to be knowledgeable, so for this cause, we are only allowing people with more than a hundred shows watched publish critiques, feel free to discuss though!

Network

Get the opportunity to make new acquaintances and friends from all over the world, share and discuss shows, but most importantly, HAVE FUN!

Join Animation Fans as a Critic
